DBActionsException - Exception in il.ac.hit.Exceptions
This is the exception class for the project handles projects thrown exceptions most of the exceptions thrown are SQL based exceptions.
DBActionsException() - Constructor for exception il.ac.hit.Exceptions.DBActionsException
DBActionsException constructor using the super constructor
DBActionsException(String) - Constructor for exception il.ac.hit.Exceptions.DBActionsException
DBActionsException constructor gets the cause written message and act accordingly
DBActionsException(String, Throwable) - Constructor for exception il.ac.hit.Exceptions.DBActionsException
DBActionsException constructor gets the cause written message and the root cause and acts accordingly
DbConnection - Class in il.ac.hit.Model
This class is a Singleton pattern and is in charge of the connection to the DB it's only method is used throughout every action which interacts with the DB and get the connection
deleteGrade(String) - Method in interface il.ac.hit.Interfaces.ISimpleActions
deleteGrade function is used by the user to delete a grade give the key-courseName
deleteGrade(String) - Method in class il.ac.hit.Model.Model
deletes specific course from db table The String courseName must hold a correct name of the specific course we intend to delete.
deleteGrade(String) - Method in class il.ac.hit.View.TableHomeFrame
This method is triggered once the "Delete Grade" button is pressed by the user.
deleteGrade(String) - Method in class il.ac.hit.ViewModel.ViewModel
calls the delete method from the Model updates the table at the end of the action
